A great sequel to the first game where you shoot portals to get to the next room/challenge. I would say this game is more fun when played with a friend, because you get to solve puzzles together rather than struggle alone :P  
You also get Wheatley, who is an entertaining AI companion <3

Overall Rating: 6.9/10

An excellent follow up to an already great game, Portal 2 takes everything you love about the first game and gives it an upgrade. Bigger story, bigger mechanics, and bigger replay value. Multiplayer is a fantastic addition and the ability to download custom maps from the workshop means you'll never run out of chambers to explore. Just don't spend money on cosmetics, they aren't worth anything. Non-tradable.
It's a great game with portals and a twist, go download it now.
Epic game must buy especially if on sale
